ml_tags: Precious are the Memories John Lewis Hayward of 1734853 16th January 1949 - 17th December 2021 Loving husband to Jocelyn Amber, Hayden, Hugh & Heath Natalya, Breeanna, Jake, AJ, Kaylee & Cadence Father to Troy, Wayne & Gabrielle (dec), Hugh & Casie L/Cpl. John "TEX" Hayward 2 RAR Australian  Tast Force Base Nui-Dat, Vietnam You are loved beyond words & missed beyond measure Your life was a blessing, your memory a treasure Wonderful Pop to Madison, Harry & Mary
